name: Super Plush Festival
description:
Collect cute animal plushes at the plush festival by swiping and sliding to match three or more plushes together!

  • Complete 200 levels in story mode
  • Unlock Arcade Mode and grab the highest score you can
  • Complete challenges to collect 50 colorful stickers
  • Compete for the top score on the global leaderboards

    • Join the festival now!
